title: 306: Bachelor in Paradise: Ep 10 (Bachelor Announced! + New Host! + Aaron was Finally Actually Lied To! + More!)
itunes:title: 306: Bachelor in Paradise: Ep 10 (Bachelor Announced! + New Host! + Aaron was Finally Actually Lied To! + More!)
description:
It’s time to recap the recent 3 hour episode of BIP, but FIRST The Broads discuss our future Bachelor and new host for the franchise (approx 00:03:30 - 00:19:00)! Then they dive into the Ivan lying scandal, Aaron’s worst fears realized, updated thoughts on Ed, Mykenna being quarantined for 100 years, love for Thomas, Noah and Abigail’s prom, and more! 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***STAMPS.COM: get a 4-week trial PLUS free postage and a digital scale at STAMPS.COM with code CHATTY

***HALO COLLAR: Save 20% on your Halo Collar by going to SHOPHALOCOLLAR.COM/CHATTY

***CAT PERSON: Go to CATPERSON.COM/CHATTY and use code CHATTY to save nearly 50% on your Starter Box + free shipping!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
